page.title: 12INDUSTRY 2
page.content: {Orbit Motors} Orbit Motors was opened in 1933. They sell eleven thousand gallons of petrol a week. They are open from 7.45 in the morning to 6.30 at night. They sell mostly SAAB cars, they sell sweets, drinks, and car utensils. They have had three breakin's but no fires. They make about twenty one thousand pounds a week. {East Hanney shop} Mr Shepherd has a sweet shop as well as a grocery shop. He also sells cards and paper as well. He sells cat and dog food. His house is behind the shop and his dog which is an alsation guards the shop. {New Shop} It used to be called Betty's shop but she grew ill and couldn't run it. She sold it and now the are making it into a bigger and safer shop.
